name: Food Fight Frenzy
description:
This is a game about eating and slinging food at your friends.  It's a multiplayer LAN game with up to four players. The goal is to eat  the food pellets of your same color while simultaneously  attacking your friends to reduce their food count. As you consume more pellets your character will grow, and as you get hit you will likewise shrink. The first one to 10, 20 or 30 food pellets is the winner.

(Used Photon for the networking)
